Headline: #87 Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Commercial
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Commercial, 90th, Buffalo and 91st due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Commercial, 90th, Buffalo and 91st due to street blockage.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Linden
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Linden due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Linden due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Linden. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Linden.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
